parse:
run P2 {
    some disj I,F : User | some disj P1 : Photo | some disj D1 : Day {
        User = I + F
        Influencer = I
        Photo = P1
        Ad = none
        Day = D1

        follows = F->I
        posts = I->P1
        sees = F->P1
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 1

run P3 {
    some disj I,A : User | some disj P1,P2,P3 : Photo | some disj D1,D2 : Day {
        User = I + A
        Influencer = I
        Photo = P1 + P2 + P3
        Ad = P3
        Day = D1 + D2

        follows = A->I
        posts = I->P1 + I->P2 + A->P3
        sees = I->P3 + A->P3 + A->P1 + A->P2
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1 + P2->D2 + P3->D1
    }
} for 2 User, 3 Photo, 2 Day expect 1

run P4 {
    some disj I1,I2,R : User | some disj P1,P2,P3,P4 : Photo | some disj D1,D2 : Day {
        User = I1 + I2 + R
        Influencer = I1 + I2
        Photo = P1 + P2 + P3 + P4
        Ad = none
        Day = D1 + D2

        follows = R->I1 + R->I2 + I1->I2 + I2->I1
        posts = I1->P1 + I1->P2 + I2->P3 + I2->P4
        sees = R->P1 + R->P2 + R->P3 + R->P4 + I1->P3 + I1->P4 + I2->P1 + I2->P2
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1 + P2->D2 + P3->D1 + P4->D2
    }
} for 3 User, 4 Photo, 2 Day expect 1

run N1 {
    some disj I : User | some disj : Photo | some disj D1 : Day {
        User = I
        Influencer = I
        Photo = none
        Ad = none
        Day = D1

        follows = none
        posts = none
        sees = none
        suggested = none
        date = none->none
    }
} for 1 User, 0 Photo, 1 Day expect 0

run N2 {
    some disj I,F : User | some disj P1 : Photo | some disj D1,D2 : Day {
        User = I + F
        Influencer = I
        Photo = P1
        Ad = none
        Day = D1 + D2

        follows = F->I
        posts = I->P1
        sees = F->P1
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 2 Day expect 0

run N3 {
    some disj I1,I2 : User | some disj P1,P2 : Photo | some disj D1,D2 : Day {
        User = I1 + I2
        Influencer = I1 + I2
        Photo = P1 + P2
        Ad = none
        Day = D1 + D2

        follows = I1->I2 + I2->I1
        posts = I1->P1 + I1->P2
        sees = I2->P1 + I2->P2
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1 + P2->D2
    }
} for 2 User, 2 Photo, 2 Day expect 0

run N4 {
    some disj I,U : User | some disj A1 : Photo | some disj D1,D2 : Day {
        User = I + U
        Influencer = I
        Photo = A1
        Ad = A1
        Day = D1 + D2

        follows = U->I
        posts = I->A1
        sees = I->A1 + U->A1
        suggested = none
        date = A1->D1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 2 Day expect 0

valid:
run Pos2 {
    some disj WS1, WS2 : Workstation | some disj W_H1, W_R1 : Worker | some disj P_C1, P_C2 : Product {
        Workstation = WS1 + WS2
        begin = WS1
        end = WS2
        succ = none->none

        Worker = W_H1 + W_R1
        Human = W_H1
        Robot = W_R1
        workers = WS1->W_H1 + WS2->W_R1

        Product = P_C1 + P_C2
        Component = P_C1 + P_C2
        Material = none
        Dangerous = P_C1 + P_C2

        parts = P_C1->P_C2 + P_C2->P_C1
        workstation = P_C1->WS1 + P_C2->WS2
    }
} for 2 Workstation, 2 Worker, 2 Product expect 1

parse:
run Pos1 {
    some disj P1,P2 : Person | some disj C1 : Course | some disj J1,J2 : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P1 + P2
        Professor = P1
        Student = P2
        Course = C1
        Project = J1 + J2
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = P1->C1
        Person <: enrolled = P2->C1
        Person <: projects = none
        Course <: projects = C1->J1 + C1->J2
        grades = C1->P2->G1
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 2 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Pos3 {
    some disj P1,P2 : Person | some disj C1 : Course | some disj J1 : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P1 + P2
        Professor = P1
        Student = P2
        Course = C1
        Project = J1
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = P1->C1
        Person <: enrolled = none
        Person <: projects = P2->J1
        Course <: projects = C1->J1
        grades = none->none->none
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Neg1_NoCourseForProject {
    some disj P1,P2 : Person | some disj C1 : Course | some disj J1 : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P1 + P2
        Professor = P1
        Student = P2
        Course = C1
        Project = J1
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = P1->C1
        Person <: enrolled = P2->C1
        Person <: projects = none
        Course <: projects = none
        grades = C1->P2->G1
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg3_UnassignedAmongOthers {
    some disj P1,P2 : Person | some disj C1 : Course | some disj J1,J2 : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P1 + P2
        Professor = P1
        Student = P2
        Course = C1
        Project = J1 + J2
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = P1->C1
        Person <: enrolled = P2->C1
        Person <: projects = none
        Course <: projects = C1->J1
        grades = C1->P2->G1
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 2 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

valid:
run Neg1 {
    some disj P, Q : Person | some disj C : Course | some disj PR : Project | some disj G1, G2 : Grade {
        Person = P + Q
        Professor = P + Q
        Student = Q

        Course = C
        Project = PR
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = P->C
        enrolled = Q->C

        Person <: projects = Q->PR
        Course <: projects = C->PR

        grades = C->Q->G1

        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg2 {
    some disj P1, P2, S : Person | some disj C1, C2 : Course | some disj PR1, PR2 : Project | some disj G1, G2, G3 : Grade {
        Person = P1 + P2 + S
        Professor = P1 + P2
        Student = P2 + S

        Course = C1 + C2
        Project = PR1 + PR2
        Grade = G1 + G2 + G3

        teaches = P1->C1 + P2->C2
        enrolled = P2->C1 + S->C2

        Person <: projects = P2->PR1 + S->PR2
        Course <: projects = C1->PR1 + C2->PR2

        grades = C1->P2->G1 + C2->S->G2

        Grade <: next = G1->G2 + G2->G3
    }
} for 3 Person, 2 Course, 2 Project, 3 Grade expect 0

run Neg3 {
    some disj P1, P2, P3 : Person | some disj C : Course | some disj PR : Project | some disj G1, G2 : Grade {
        Person = P1 + P2 + P3
        Professor = P1 + P2 + P3
        Student = P3

        Course = C
        Project = PR
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = P1->C + P2->C
        enrolled = P3->C

        Person <: projects = P3->PR
        Course <: projects = C->PR

        grades = C->P3->G1

        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 3 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg4 {
    some disj P1, P2, P3 : Person | some disj C : Course | some disj PR1, PR2 : Project | some disj G1, G2, G3 : Grade {
        Person = P1 + P2 + P3
        Professor = P1 + P2 + P3
        Student = P2 + P3

        Course = C
        Project = PR1 + PR2
        Grade = G1 + G2 + G3

        teaches = P1->C
        enrolled = P2->C + P3->C

        Person <: projects = P2->PR1 + P3->PR2
        Course <: projects = C->PR1 + C->PR2

        grades = C->P2->G1

        Grade <: next = G1->G2 + G2->G3
    }
} for 3 Person, 1 Course, 2 Project, 3 Grade expect 0

parse:
run Pos1 {
  some disj P1: Person | some disj C1: Course | some disj G1: Grade {
    Person = P1
    Professor = P1
    Student = none
    Course = C1
    Project = none
    Grade = G1

    Person <: teaches = P1->C1
    Person <: enrolled = none
    Person <: projects = none
    Course <: projects = none
    Course <: grades = none->none->none

    Grade <: next = none
  }
} for 1 Person, 1 Course, 0 Project, 1 Grade expect 1

run Pos2 {
  some disj Prof1,Stu1: Person | some disj C1: Course | some disj PR1: Project | some disj G1: Grade {
    Person = Prof1 + Stu1
    Professor = Prof1
    Student = Stu1
    Course = C1
    Project = PR1
    Grade = G1

    Person <: teaches = Prof1->C1
    Person <: enrolled = Stu1->C1
    Person <: projects = Stu1->PR1
    Course <: projects = C1->PR1
    Course <: grades = C1->Stu1->G1

    Grade <: next = none
  }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 1 Grade expect 1

run Neg1 {
  some disj Prof1: Person | some disj C1: Course | some disj G1: Grade {
    Person = Prof1
    Professor = Prof1
    Student = none
    Course = C1
    Project = none
    Grade = G1

    Person <: teaches = Prof1->C1
    Person <: enrolled = none
    Person <: projects = none
    Course <: projects = none
    Course <: grades = C1->Prof1->G1

    Grade <: next = none
  }
} for 1 Person, 1 Course, 0 Project, 1 Grade expect 0

run Neg2 {
  some disj Prof1,Stu1: Person | some disj C1: Course | some disj PR1: Project | some disj G1: Grade {
    Person = Prof1 + Stu1
    Professor = Prof1
    Student = Stu1
    Course = C1
    Project = PR1
    Grade = G1

    Person <: teaches = Prof1->C1
    Person <: enrolled = Stu1->C1
    Person <: projects = Stu1->PR1
    Course <: projects = C1->PR1
    Course <: grades = C1->Prof1->G1 + C1->Stu1->G1

    Grade <: next = none
  }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 1 Grade expect 0

run Neg4 {
  some disj Prof1,Prof2: Person | some disj C1,C2: Course | some disj G1,G2: Grade {
    Person = Prof1 + Prof2
    Professor = Prof1 + Prof2
    Student = none
    Course = C1 + C2
    Project = none
    Grade = G1 + G2

    Person <: teaches = Prof1->C1 + Prof2->C2
    Person <: enrolled = none
    Person <: projects = none
    Course <: projects = none
    Course <: grades = C1->Prof1->G1 + C2->Prof2->G2

    Grade <: next = G1->G2
  }
} for 2 Person, 2 Course, 0 Project, 2 Grade expect 0
